variables.name: EEPROM_STATUS
variables.comment: The status of the DRS's EEPROM. 0 => Hardware failure, 1 => Memory invalid, 3 => Memory valid.

variables.name: THETA_MIN
variables.comment: The absolute minimum angle that the servo can go to.

variables.name: THETA_MAX
variables.comment: The absolute maximum angle that the servo can go to.

variables.name: THETA_STEP
variables.comment: The incremental angular step that the servo takes each loop.

variables.name: THETA_B
variables.comment: The real world initial start position of the servo, we use this to predict where the servo is in relation to what the code may say.

variables.name: THETA_BACKOFF
variables.comment: The angular amount that the servo takes in the opposite direction when a stall condition is met to prevent getting caught on debris.

variables.name: THETA_TARGET
variables.comment: The calculated next position that the servo will take.

variables.name: THETA_OPEN
variables.comment: The angular position where the wing is 'open.'

variables.name: THETA_CLOSED
variables.comment: The angular position where the wing is 'closed.'
